author: Alastair Jennings
title: This firm is 3D-printing medical face shields to protect frontline staff
description: Prusa Research has already distributed 16,000 units to medical professionals across the Czech Republic.
content: Strategies to mitigate the effects of the ongoing pandemic are being implemented across the globe, from self-isolation to social distancing, but cases of the virus are still increasing. There is also a shortage of much needed medical equipment, such as ventil… [+5947 chars]
